Posts.EditableText: Hello!! I was wondering how long it usually takes for games to get categorized. I understand there aren't many moderators and it takes a lot of time, but my game (https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/6nlzuizuaecwglnahu92ia/greehouse-game) has been uncategorized since August and I just wanted to know if that's normal for this site. Thank u sm for reading!!:)
